blogPost.excerpt: Focus on the three most important tasks every day. To be really effective you have to pick up the three most significant tasks per day. A massive productivity improvement and considered by many experts to be the best to-do strategy. Look it up!
blogPost.body: Focus on the three most important tasks every day. To be really effective you have to pick up the three most significant tasks per day. A massive productivity improvement and considered by many experts to be the best to-do strategy. Look it up!
blogPost.title: 3 Things - Focus on the 3 most important things today
blogPost.author: Marta

localize.description: 每天专注于三个最重要的任务。要想真正提高工作效率，你必须每天拿起最重要的三项任务。大幅度提高生产力，被很多专家认为是最好的待办事项策略。看看吧!
localize.tagline: 专注于今天最重要的3件事

localize.description: 每天專注於三個最重要的任務。要想真正提高工作效率，你必須每天拿起最重要的三項任務。大幅度提高生產力，被很多專家認爲是最好的待辦事項策略。看看吧!
localize.tagline: 專注於今天最重要的3件事

previous.excerpt: A small weekend project visualizing the estimated cost of the Ever Given cargo ship blocking the Suez canal. Has a silly feature where you can guess when the blockage will be over.
previous.title: Suez Canal Blockage - See how much it costs & guess when the blockage is over

localize.description: 一个周末的小项目，可视化的Ever Given货船堵塞苏伊士运河的估计成本。有一个愚蠢的功能，你可以猜测什么时候堵塞会结束。
localize.tagline: 看看要花多少钱&猜猜看什么时候堵完了

localize.description: 一個週末的小項目，可視化的Ever Given貨船堵塞蘇伊士運河的估計成本。有一個愚蠢的功能，你可以猜測什麼時候堵塞會結束。
localize.tagline: 看看要花多少錢&猜猜看什麼時候堵完了
